snippet.title: FOOSBALL RUNNER Trailer NEW
snippet.description:
🎮🚀 FOOSBALL RUNNER is Coming September 30th on Steam. 🚀🎮

👽🌌 About the Game:

Picture this: You, a rotund footballer, sprinting through high-tech spaceship halls, dodging spinning figures, and collecting keys like your life depends on it (well, your score does!). The goal? Unlock the gates and score within a minute! It’s table football like you've never seen before!


Features That’ll Make You LOL (and scream):

⚡ Futuristic Tables: Navigate sleek, spaceship-themed tables that’ll make you feel like you’re in a sci-fi movie.
⚙️ Dodging Madness: Spin, duck, and dodge those pesky figures that just keep getting faster and meaner.
🔑 Key Collecting: Hunt down 5 keys scattered across the table to unlock the gate.
🕹️ Power-Ups: Turn off the figures for a breather or get a speed boost – because who doesn’t love going turbo?
🤼 Multiplayer Mayhem: Challenge your friends in epic matches where the first to score 5 goals wins. No timer, just pure competitive chaos!

So, what are you waiting for? Add FOOSBALL RUNNER to your Steam wishlist now and get ready to roll into the fun when it launches!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3123310/FOOSBALL_RUNNER/
